sentences.en: Bill was kicked out of the military for being a slacker.
sentences.cn: 比尔因懒惰懈怠而从军队里被赶了出来.

sentences.en: But the labor market is slacker than an 8.3 % jobless rate suggests.
sentences.cn: 但劳动力市场却比8.3%这一失业率所显示的情况要严峻.

sentences.en: Go the extra mile . It makes your boss look like an incompetent slacker.
sentences.cn: 做得更多. 这使得你的老板看起来像个不称职的懒虫.

sentences.en: He's a slacker, he actually skipped off and left us to do the clearing away.
sentences.cn: 他是个懒鬼, 他居然悄悄地溜走而把清除工作留给我们来做.

sentences.en: He's a slacker, he actuallyand left us do the clearing away.

sentences.en: He's not a slacker, he's the best worker they've got.
sentences.cn: 他可不是个会偷懒的人，他是他们最好的工人。

sentences.en: His slacker buddies, sleeping until noon every day.
sentences.cn: 他的两个每天睡到中午的懒哥们.
